body:
fixes https://github.com/LLNL/spack/issues/4529

Since sorting one way or the other didn't seem to be a big deal, I adjusted logic so that variants are displayed during `spack info` in the order a package declares them.

This required me to add a member to a variant indicating its declaration order. Didn't see a cleaner way to handle it.
title: Spack info maintain variant declaration order
